data.text: You come across a vertical shaft with a ladder against one side. A time-faded sign barely legible in the dim light reads "SURFACE: Primary".
An experimental climb and a shove against the trapdoor at the top confirms it: you've re-emerged into the village outskirts. The train is just visible behind a few buildings.
It's good to know where this entrance is. You should be able to get back here from above now.
